keyMoments.title: Mocha's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Mocha appears as one of the giant children in the Biscuits Room, having been experimented on by Caesar Clown with gigantification drugs.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Mocha, who will become a key character in the children's storyline and ultimately play a heroic role in stopping the other children from taking the dangerous candy.

relationships.description: Chopper helps treat Mocha and the other children

reveals.information: Victim of Caesar Clown's gigantification experiments

keyMoments.title: Sind's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Sind appears as one of the giant children in the Biscuits Room, showing amazement at Franky's robot form and fear of Kin'emon's severed head.
keyMoments.significance: Sind represents one of the many innocent victims of Caesar's experiments, highlighting the cruelty of the antagonist.

reveals.information: Victim of Caesar Clown's gigantification experiments

keyMoments.title: Konbu's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Konbu appears as one of the giant children in the Biscuits Room and is mentioned as one who escapes in this episode.
keyMoments.significance: Konbu is one of the children the Straw Hats work to protect from Caesar's experiments.

reveals.information: Victim of Caesar Clown's gigantification experiments

keyMoments.title: Doran's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Doran appears as one of the giant children in the Biscuits Room who needs the Straw Hats' help to escape.
keyMoments.significance: Doran is one of the children the Straw Hats commit to saving from Caesar's facility.

reveals.information: Victim of Caesar Clown's gigantification experiments

keyMoments.title: Ally's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Ally appears as one of the giant children in the Biscuits Room.
keyMoments.significance: Another victim of Caesar's cruel experiments that the Straw Hats work to save.

reveals.information: Victim of Caesar Clown's gigantification experiments

keyMoments.title: Biyo's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Biyo appears as one of the giant children in the Biscuits Room.
keyMoments.significance: One of the children experimented on by Caesar that the Straw Hats rescue.

reveals.information: Victim of Caesar Clown's gigantification experiments

keyMoments.title: Uzu's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Uzu appears as one of the giant children in the Biscuits Room.
keyMoments.significance: One of the children the Straw Hats commit to protecting from Caesar's operations.

reveals.information: Victim of Caesar Clown's gigantification experiments

keyMoments.title: Nami Declares War to Save the Children
keyMoments.description: Nami's maternal instincts take over when she sees the children in distress. Despite the danger and their original plan to escape, she declares war on anyone who makes children cry.
keyMoments.significance: This decision defines the Straw Hats' mission for the remainder of the Punk Hazard arc and showcases Nami's compassionate leadership.
keyMoments.quote: I'm declaring war on anyone who makes a kid cry!

reveals.information: Nami has a particularly strong protective instinct toward children

keyMoments.title: Usopp Debuts Midori Boshi: Boaty Banana
keyMoments.description: Usopp demonstrates his mastery of Pop Greens by creating a banana-shaped boat that can withstand the boiling lake waters of Punk Hazard.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Usopp's growth during the two-year timeskip and his increased utility as a support member of the crew.

keyMoments.title: Usopp Debuts Midori Boshi: Uchiwa So
keyMoments.description: Usopp uses Pop Green to create fan-shaped grass that serves as paddles for the Boaty Banana.
keyMoments.significance: Further demonstrates the versatility of Usopp's Pop Green techniques.

abilities.description: Usopp shoots a Pop Green onto water that turns into a banana-shaped boat, durable enough to withstand boiling water.
Usopp shoots a Pop Green which sprouts tall grass with fan-shaped ends, used as paddles.

keyMoments.title: Sanji Uses Collier Strike
keyMoments.description: Sanji battles the hazmat soldiers using Collier Strike, a Diable Jambe variation where he delivers a devastating flaming kick to the opponent's neck.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Sanji's post-timeskip combat abilities and his commitment to protecting children.

abilities.description: An enhanced version of Collier Shoot where Sanji jumps into the air and delivers a devastating flaming kick to the opponent's neck.

name.japanese: トラファルガー・D・ワーテル・ロー

keyMoments.title: Law Appears at Punk Hazard Facility
keyMoments.description: Trafalgar Law, now one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea, emerges from the facility entrance to confront Smoker and the Marines.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Law in the Punk Hazard arc, revealing his connection to the island and setting up major plot developments.

keyMoments.title: Law's Warlord Status Details Revealed
keyMoments.description: It is revealed that Law sent one hundred pirate hearts to the World Government to earn his position as a Warlord.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Law's ruthlessness and strategic thinking in achieving his goals.

reveals.information: Law is now one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea
Law sent 100 pirate hearts to the World Government to become a Warlord
Law has a connection to Punk Hazard and claims it as his vacation home
